instruction:
Spelling

This section of the test contains fill-in-the-blank questions, which you must answer by typing a missing word in the box provided. Use your mouse to click on [Play Audio] to hear the missing word spoken in the sentence. Upon answering a question, you can go on to the next question by clicking the Next button on the toolbar.

During this section of the test, if you choose you may skip an item and then later return to that item.

After you have answered all questions, click Submit on the Header section. Your Test Administrator may have set a time limit for this test section. If there is a time limit, you will be told how much time you have. If a time limit has been set for this section of the test, you will notice a countdown timer on the Header of the screen, showing the amount of time remaining to complete this section of the test.

We recommend that you go to the practice version of this section of the test to learn more about how you should respond to items during this section of the test.
